                              <div class="line">am sick, or not at home; what you will, to dismiss it.</div>
                              <p>Exit MALVOLIO</p>
                              <div class="line">Now you see, sir, how your fooling grows old, and</div>
                              <div class="line">people dislike it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast spoke for us, madonna, as if thy eldest</div>
                              <div class="line">son should be a fool; whose skull Jove cram with</div>
                              <div class="line">brains! for,--here he comes,--one of thy kin has a</div>
                              <div class="line">most weak pia mater.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter SIR TOBY BELCH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">By mine honour, half drunk. What is he at the gate, cousin?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">A gentleman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">A gentleman! what gentleman?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis a gentle man here--a plague o' these</div>
                              <div class="line">pickle-herring! How now, sot!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Sir Toby!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Cousin, cousin, how have you come so early by this lethargy?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Lechery! I defy lechery. There's one at the gate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, marry, what is he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Let him be the devil, an he will, I care not: give</div>
                              <div class="line">me faith, say I. Well, it's all one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">What's a drunken man like, fool?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Like a drowned man, a fool and a mad man: one</div>
                              <div class="line">draught above heat makes him a fool; the second mads</div>
                              <div class="line">him; and a third drowns him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Go thou and seek the crowner, and let him sit o' my</div>
                              <div class="line">coz; for he's in the third degree of drink, he's</div>
                              <div class="line">drowned: go, look after him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">He is but mad yet, madonna; and the fool shall look</div>
                              <div class="line">to the madman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Re-enter MALVOLIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, yond young fellow swears he will speak with</div>
                              <div class="line">you. I told him you were sick; he takes on him to</div>
                              <div class="line">understand so much, and therefore comes to speak</div>
                              <div class="line">with you. I told him you were asleep; he seems to</div>
                              <div class="line">have a foreknowledge of that too, and therefore</div>
                              <div class="line">comes to speak with you. What is to be said to him,</div>
                              <div class="line">lady? he's fortified against any denial.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell him he shall not speak with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Has been told so; and he says, he'll stand at your</div>
                              <div class="line">door like a sheriff's post, and be the supporter to</div>
                              <div class="line">a bench, but he'll speak with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">What kind o' man is he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, of mankind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">What manner of man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Of very ill manner; he'll speak with you, will you or no.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Of what personage and years is he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not yet old enough for a man, nor young enough for</div>
                              <div class="line">a boy; as a squash is before 'tis a peascod, or a</div>
                              <div class="line">cooling when 'tis almost an apple: 'tis with him</div>
                              <div class="line">in standing water, between boy and man. He is very</div>
                              <div class="line">well-favoured and he speaks very shrewishly; one</div>
                              <div class="line">would think his mother's milk were scarce out of him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Let him approach: call in my gentlewoman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Gentlewoman, my lady calls.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Re-enter MARIA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me my veil: come, throw it o'er my face.</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll once more hear Orsino's embassy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter VIOLA, and Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">The honourable lady of the house, which is she?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak to me; I shall answer for her.</div>
                              <div class="line">Your will?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Most radiant, exquisite and unmatchable beauty,--I</div>
                              <div class="line">pray you, tell me if this be the lady of the house,</div>
                              <div class="line">for I never saw her: I would be loath to cast away</div>
                              <div class="line">my speech, for besides that it is excellently well</div>
                              <div class="line">penned, I have taken great pains to con it. Good</div>
                              <div class="line">beauties, let me sustain no scorn; I am very</div>
                              <div class="line">comptible, even to the least sinister usage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Whence came you, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I can say little more than I have studied, and that</div>
                              <div class="line">question's out of my part. Good gentle one, give me</div>
                              <div class="line">modest assurance if you be the lady of the house,</div>
                              <div class="line">that I may proceed in my speech.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you a comedian?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, my profound heart: and yet, by the very fangs</div>
                              <div class="line">of malice I swear, I am not that I play. Are you</div>
                              <div class="line">the lady of the house?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">If I do not usurp myself, I am.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Most certain, if you are she, you do usurp</div>
                              <div class="line">yourself; for what is yours to bestow is not yours</div>
                              <div class="line">to reserve. But this is from my commission: I will</div>
                              <div class="line">on with my speech in your praise, and then show you</div>
                              <div class="line">the heart of my message.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Come to what is important in't: I forgive you the praise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, I took great pains to study it, and 'tis poetical.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">It is the more like to be feigned: I pray you,</div>
                              <div class="line">keep it in. I heard you were saucy at my gates,</div>
                              <div class="line">and allowed your approach rather to wonder at you</div>
                              <div class="line">than to hear you. If you be not mad, be gone; if</div>
                              <div class="line">you have reason, be brief: 'tis not that time of</div>
                              <div class="line">moon with me to make one in so skipping a dialogue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you hoist sail, sir? here lies your way.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, good swabber; I am to hull here a little</div>
                              <div class="line">longer. Some mollification for your giant, sweet</div>
                              <div class="line">lady. Tell me your mind: I am a messenger.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Sure, you have some hideous matter to deliver, when</div>
                              <div class="line">the courtesy of it is so fearful. Speak your office.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">It alone concerns your ear. I bring no overture of</div>
                              <div class="line">war, no taxation of homage: I hold the olive in my</div>
                              <div class="line">hand; my words are as fun of peace as matter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet you began rudely. What are you? what would you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">The rudeness that hath appeared in me have I</div>
                              <div class="line">learned from my entertainment. What I am, and what I</div>
                              <div class="line">would, are as secret as maidenhead; to your ears,</div>
                              <div class="line">divinity, to any other's, profanation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Give us the place alone: we will hear this divinity.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt MARIA and Attendants</p>
                              <div class="line">Now, sir, what is your text?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Most sweet lady,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">A comfortable doctrine, and much may be said of it.</div>
                              <div class="line">Where lies your text?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">In Orsino's bosom.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">In his bosom! In what chapter of his bosom?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">To answer by the method, in the first of his heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, I have read it: it is heresy. Have you no more to say?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Good madam, let me see your face.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you any commission from your lord to negotiate</div>
                              <div class="line">with my face? You are now out of your text: but</div>
                              <div class="line">we will draw the curtain and show you the picture.</div>
                              <div class="line">Look you, sir, such a one I was this present: is't</div>
                              <div class="line">not well done?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Unveiling</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Excellently done, if God did all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis in grain, sir; 'twill endure wind and weather.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis beauty truly blent, whose red and white</div>
                              <div class="line">Nature's own sweet and cunning hand laid on:</div>
                              <div class="line">Lady, you are the cruell'st she alive,</div>
                              <div class="line">If you will lead these graces to the grave</div>
                              <div class="line">And leave the world no copy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, sir, I will not be so hard-hearted; I will give</div>
                              <div class="line">out divers schedules of my beauty: it shall be</div>
                              <div class="line">inventoried, and every particle and utensil</div>
                              <div class="line">labelled to my will: as, item, two lips,</div>
                              <div class="line">indifferent red; item, two grey eyes, with lids to</div>
                              <div class="line">them; item, one neck, one chin, and so forth. Were</div>
                              <div class="line">you sent hither to praise me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I see you what you are, you are too proud;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, if you were the devil, you are fair.</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord and master loves you: O, such love</div>
                              <div class="line">Could be but recompensed, though you were crown'd</div>
                              <div class="line">The nonpareil of beauty!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">How does he love me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">With adorations, fertile tears,</div>
                              <div class="line">With groans that thunder love, with sighs of fire.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Your lord does know my mind; I cannot love him:</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet I suppose him virtuous, know him noble,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of great estate, of fresh and stainless youth;</div>
                              <div class="line">In voices well divulged, free, learn'd and valiant;</div>
                              <div class="line">And in dimension and the shape of nature</div>
                              <div class="line">A gracious person: but yet I cannot love him;</div>
                              <div class="line">He might have took his answer long ago.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">If I did love you in my master's flame,</div>
                              <div class="line">With such a suffering, such a deadly life,</div>
                              <div class="line">In your denial I would find no sense;</div>
                              <div class="line">I would not understand it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what would you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Make me a willow cabin at your gate,</div>
                              <div class="line">And call upon my soul within the house;</div>
                              <div class="line">Write loyal cantons of contemned love</div>
                              <div class="line">And sing them loud even in the dead of night;</div>
                              <div class="line">Halloo your name to the reverberate hills</div>
                              <div class="line">And make the babbling gossip of the air</div>
                              <div class="line">Cry out 'Olivia!' O, You should not rest</div>
                              <div class="line">Between the elements of air and earth,</div>
                              <div class="line">But you should pity me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">You might do much.</div>
                              <div class="line">What is your parentage?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Above my fortunes, yet my state is well:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a gentleman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Get you to your lord;</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot love him: let him send no more;</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless, perchance, you come to me again,</div>
                              <div class="line">To tell me how he takes it. Fare you well:</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you for your pains: spend this for me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am no fee'd post, lady; keep your purse:</div>
                              <div class="line">My master, not myself, lacks recompense.</div>
                              <div class="line">Love make his heart of flint that you shall love;</div>
                              <div class="line">And let your fervor, like my master's, be</div>
                              <div class="line">Placed in contempt! Farewell, fair cruelty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">'What is your parentage?'</div>
                              <div class="line">'Above my fortunes, yet my state is well:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a gentleman.' I'll be sworn thou art;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy tongue, thy face, thy limbs, actions and spirit,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do give thee five-fold blazon: not too fast:</div>
                              <div class="line">soft, soft!</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless the master were the man. How now!</div>
                              <div class="line">Even so quickly may one catch the plague?</div>
                              <div class="line">Methinks I feel this youth's perfections</div>
                              <div class="line">With an invisible and subtle stealth</div>
                              <div class="line">To creep in at mine eyes. Well, let it be.</div>
                              <div class="line">What ho, Malvolio!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter MALVOLIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, madam, at your service.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Run after that same peevish messenger,</div>
                              <div class="line">The county's man: he left this ring behind him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would I or not: tell him I'll none of it.</div>
                              <div class="line">Desire him not to flatter with his lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor hold him up with hopes; I am not for him:</div>
                              <div class="line">If that the youth will come this way to-morrow,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll give him reasons for't: hie thee, Malvolio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, I will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I do I know not what, and fear to find</div>
                              <div class="line">Mine eye too great a flatterer for my mind.</div>
                              <div class="line">Fate, show thy force: ourselves we do not owe;</div>
                              <div class="line">What is decreed must be, and be this so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.4">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  The sea-coast.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.4">3. SCENE III.  OLIVIA's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.5">4. SCENE IV.  DUKE ORSINO's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.6">5. SCENE V.  OLIVIA's garden.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  The sea-coast.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ANTONIO and SEBASTIAN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you stay no longer? nor will you not that I go with you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">By your patience, no. My stars shine darkly over</div>
                              <div class="line">me: the malignancy of my fate might perhaps</div>
                              <div class="line">distemper yours; therefore I shall crave of you your</div>
                              <div class="line">leave that I may bear my evils alone: it were a bad</div>
                              <div class="line">recompense for your love, to lay any of them on you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me yet know of you whither you are bound.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">No, sooth, sir: my determinate voyage is mere</div>
                              <div class="line">extravagancy. But I perceive in you so excellent a</div>
                              <div class="line">touch of modesty, that you will not extort from me</div>
                              <div class="line">what I am willing to keep in; therefore it charges</div>
                              <div class="line">me in manners the rather to express myself. You</div>
                              <div class="line">must know of me then, Antonio, my name is Sebastian,</div>
                              <div class="line">which I called Roderigo. My father was that</div>
                              <div class="line">Sebastian of Messaline, whom I know you have heard</div>
                              <div class="line">of. He left behind him myself and a sister, both</div>
                              <div class="line">born in an hour: if the heavens had been pleased,</div>
                              <div class="line">would we had so ended! but you, sir, altered that;</div>
                              <div class="line">for some hour before you took me from the breach of</div>
                              <div class="line">the sea was my sister drowned.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas the day!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">A lady, sir, though it was said she much resembled</div>
                              <div class="line">me, was yet of many accounted beautiful: but,</div>
                              <div class="line">though I could not with such estimable wonder</div>
                              <div class="line">overfar believe that, yet thus far I will boldly</div>
                              <div class="line">publish her; she bore a mind that envy could not but</div>
                              <div class="line">call fair. She is drowned already, sir, with salt</div>
                              <div class="line">water, though I seem to drown her remembrance again with more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Pardon me, sir, your bad entertainment.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">O good Antonio, forgive me your trouble.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">If you will not murder me for my love, let me be</div>
                              <div class="line">your servant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">If you will not undo what you have done, that is,</div>
                              <div class="line">kill him whom you have recovered, desire it not.</div>
                              <div class="line">Fare ye well at once: my bosom is full of kindness,</div>
                              <div class="line">and I am yet so near the manners of my mother, that</div>
                              <div class="line">upon the least occasion more mine eyes will tell</div>
                              <div class="line">tales of me. I am bound to the Count Orsino's court: farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The gentleness of all the gods go with thee!</div>
                              <div class="line">I have many enemies in Orsino's court,</div>
                              <div class="line">Else would I very shortly see thee there.</div>
                              <div class="line">But, come what may, I do adore thee so,</div>
                              <div class="line">That danger shall seem sport, and I will go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  A street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter VIOLA, MALVOLIO following</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Were not you even now with the Countess Olivia?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Even now, sir; on a moderate pace I have since</div>
                              <div class="line">arrived but hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">She returns this ring to you, sir: you might have</div>
                              <div class="line">saved me my pains, to have taken it away yourself.</div>
                              <div class="line">She adds, moreover, that you should put your lord</div>
                              <div class="line">into a desperate assurance she will none of him:</div>
                              <div class="line">and one thing more, that you be never so hardy to</div>
                              <div class="line">come again in his affairs, unless it be to report</div>
                              <div class="line">your lord's taking of this. Receive it so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">She took the ring of me: I'll none of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, sir, you peevishly threw it to her; and her</div>
                              <div class="line">will is, it should be so returned: if it be worth</div>
                              <div class="line">stooping for, there it lies in your eye; if not, be</div>
                              <div class="line">it his that finds it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I left no ring with her: what means this lady?</div>
                              <div class="line">Fortune forbid my outside have not charm'd her!</div>
                              <div class="line">She made good view of me; indeed, so much,</div>
                              <div class="line">That sure methought her eyes had lost her tongue,</div>
                              <div class="line">For she did speak in starts distractedly.</div>
                              <div class="line">She loves me, sure; the cunning of her passion</div>
                              <div class="line">Invites me in this churlish messenger.</div>
                              <div class="line">None of my lord's ring! why, he sent her none.</div>
                              <div class="line">I am the man: if it be so, as 'tis,</div>
                              <div class="line">Poor lady, she were better love a dream.</div>
                              <div class="line">Disguise, I see, thou art a wickedness,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein the pregnant enemy does much.</div>
                              <div class="line">How easy is it for the proper-false</div>
                              <div class="line">In women's waxen hearts to set their forms!</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, our frailty is the cause, not we!</div>
                              <div class="line">For such as we are made of, such we be.</div>
                              <div class="line">How will this fadge? my master loves her dearly;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I, poor monster, fond as much on him;</div>
                              <div class="line">And she, mistaken, seems to dote on me.</div>
                              <div class="line">What will become of this? As I am man,</div>
                              <div class="line">My state is desperate for my master's love;</div>
                              <div class="line">As I am woman,--now alas the day!--</div>
                              <div class="line">What thriftless sighs shall poor Olivia breathe!</div>
                              <div class="line">O time! thou must untangle this, not I;</div>
                              <div class="line">It is too hard a knot for me to untie!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  OLIVIA's house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter SIR TOBY BELCH and SIR ANDREW</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Approach, Sir Andrew: not to be abed after</div>
                              <div class="line">midnight is to be up betimes; and 'diluculo</div>
                              <div class="line">surgere,' thou know'st,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, my troth, I know not: but I know, to be up</div>
                              <div class="line">late is to be up late.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">A false conclusion: I hate it as an unfilled can.</div>
                              <div class="line">To be up after midnight and to go to bed then, is</div>
                              <div class="line">early: so that to go to bed after midnight is to go</div>
                              <div class="line">to bed betimes. Does not our life consist of the</div>
                              <div class="line">four elements?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, so they say; but I think it rather consists</div>
                              <div class="line">of eating and drinking.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou'rt a scholar; let us therefore eat and drink.</div>
                              <div class="line">Marian, I say! a stoup of wine!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter Clown</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes the fool, i' faith.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, my hearts! did you never see the picture</div>
                              <div class="line">of 'we three'?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, ass. Now let's have a catch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">By my troth, the fool has an excellent breast. I</div>
                              <div class="line">had rather than forty shillings I had such a leg,</div>
                              <div class="line">and so sweet a breath to sing, as the fool has. In</div>
                              <div class="line">sooth, thou wast in very gracious fooling last</div>
                              <div class="line">night, when thou spokest of Pigrogromitus, of the</div>
                              <div class="line">Vapians passing the equinoctial of Queubus: 'twas</div>
                              <div class="line">very good, i' faith. I sent thee sixpence for thy</div>
                              <div class="line">leman: hadst it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">I did impeticos thy gratillity; for Malvolio's nose</div>
                              <div class="line">is no whipstock: my lady has a white hand, and the</div>
                              <div class="line">Myrmidons are no bottle-ale houses.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Excellent! why, this is the best fooling, when all</div>
                              <div class="line">is done. Now, a song.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on; there is sixpence for you: let's have a song.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">There's a testril of me too: if one knight give a--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Would you have a love-song, or a song of good life?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">A love-song, a love-song.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, ay: I care not for good life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Sings</span>
                              </div>
                              <div class="line">O mistress mine, where are you roaming?</div>
                              <div class="line">O, stay and hear; your true love's coming,</div>
                              <div class="line">That can sing both high and low:</div>
                              <div class="line">Trip no further, pretty sweeting;</div>
                              <div class="line">Journeys end in lovers meeting,</div>
                              <div class="line">Every wise man's son doth know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Excellent good, i' faith.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Good, good.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Sings</span>
                              </div>
                              <div class="line">What is love? 'tis not hereafter;</div>
                              <div class="line">Present mirth hath present laughter;</div>
                              <div class="line">What's to come is still unsure:</div>
                              <div class="line">In delay there lies no plenty;</div>
                              <div class="line">Then come kiss me, sweet and twenty,</div>
                              <div class="line">Youth's a stuff will not endure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">A mellifluous voice, as I am true knight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">A contagious breath.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Very sweet and contagious, i' faith.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">To hear by the nose, it is dulcet in contagion.</div>
                              <div class="line">But shall we make the welkin dance indeed? shall we</div>
                              <div class="line">rouse the night-owl in a catch that will draw three</div>
                              <div class="line">souls out of one weaver? shall we do that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">An you love me, let's do't: I am dog at a catch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">By'r lady, sir, and some dogs will catch well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Most certain. Let our catch be, 'Thou knave.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">'Hold thy peace, thou knave,' knight? I shall be</div>
                              <div class="line">constrained in't to call thee knave, knight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis not the first time I have constrained one to</div>
                              <div class="line">call me knave. Begin, fool: it begins 'Hold thy peace.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall never begin if I hold my peace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Good, i' faith. Come, begin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Catch sung</p>
                        <p>Enter MARIA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">What a caterwauling do you keep here! If my lady</div>
                              <div class="line">have not called up her steward Malvolio and bid him</div>
                              <div class="line">turn you out of doors, never trust me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">My lady's a Cataian, we are politicians, Malvolio's</div>
                              <div class="line">a Peg-a-Ramsey, and 'Three merry men be we.' Am not</div>
                              <div class="line">I consanguineous? am I not of her blood?</div>
                              <div class="line">Tillyvally. Lady!</div>
                              <p>Sings</p>
                              <div class="line">'There dwelt a man in Babylon, lady, lady!'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Beshrew me, the knight's in admirable fooling.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, he does well enough if he be disposed, and so do</div>
                              <div class="line">I too: he does it with a better grace, but I do it</div>
                              <div class="line">more natural.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Sings</span>  'O, the twelfth day of December,'--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">For the love o' God, peace!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter MALVOLIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My masters, are you mad? or what are you? Have ye</div>
                              <div class="line">no wit, manners, nor honesty, but to gabble like</div>
                              <div class="line">tinkers at this time of night? Do ye make an</div>
                              <div class="line">alehouse of my lady's house, that ye squeak out your</div>
                              <div class="line">coziers' catches without any mitigation or remorse</div>
                              <div class="line">of voice? Is there no respect of place, persons, nor</div>
                              <div class="line">time in you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">We did keep time, sir, in our catches. Sneck up!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir Toby, I must be round with you. My lady bade me</div>
                              <div class="line">tell you, that, though she harbours you as her</div>
                              <div class="line">kinsman, she's nothing allied to your disorders. If</div>
                              <div class="line">you can separate yourself and your misdemeanors, you</div>
                              <div class="line">are welcome to the house; if not, an it would please</div>
                              <div class="line">you to take leave of her, she is very willing to bid</div>
                              <div class="line">you farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">'Farewell, dear heart, since I must needs be gone.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, good Sir Toby.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">'His eyes do show his days are almost done.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't even so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">'But I will never die.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir Toby, there you lie.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">This is much credit to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">'Shall I bid him go?'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">'What an if you do?'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">'Shall I bid him go, and spare not?'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">'O no, no, no, no, you dare not.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Out o' tune, sir: ye lie. Art any more than a</div>
                              <div class="line">steward? Dost thou think, because thou art</div>
                              <div class="line">virtuous, there shall be no more cakes and ale?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, by Saint Anne, and ginger shall be hot i' the</div>
                              <div class="line">mouth too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou'rt i' the right. Go, sir, rub your chain with</div>
                              <div class="line">crumbs. A stoup of wine, Maria!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Mary, if you prized my lady's favour at any</div>
                              <div class="line">thing more than contempt, you would not give means</div>
                              <div class="line">for this uncivil rule: she shall know of it, by this hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Go shake your ears.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twere as good a deed as to drink when a man's</div>
                              <div class="line">a-hungry, to challenge him the field, and then to</div>
                              <div class="line">break promise with him and make a fool of him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Do't, knight: I'll write thee a challenge: or I'll</div>
                              <div class="line">deliver thy indignation to him by word of mouth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet Sir Toby, be patient for tonight: since the</div>
                              <div class="line">youth of the count's was today with thy lady, she is</div>
                              <div class="line">much out of quiet. For Monsieur Malvolio, let me</div>
                              <div class="line">alone with him: if I do not gull him into a</div>
                              <div class="line">nayword, and make him a common recreation, do not</div>
                              <div class="line">think I have wit enough to lie straight in my bed:</div>
                              <div class="line">I know I can do it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Possess us, possess us; tell us something of him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, sometimes he is a kind of puritan.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">O, if I thought that I'ld beat him like a dog!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">What, for being a puritan? thy exquisite reason,</div>
                              <div class="line">dear knight?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">I have no exquisite reason for't, but I have reason</div>
                              <div class="line">good enough.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">The devil a puritan that he is, or any thing</div>
                              <div class="line">constantly, but a time-pleaser; an affectioned ass,</div>
                              <div class="line">that cons state without book and utters it by great</div>
                              <div class="line">swarths: the best persuaded of himself, so</div>
                              <div class="line">crammed, as he thinks, with excellencies, that it is</div>
