                              <div class="line">Yes, being kept together and put to use.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">I would play Lord Pandarus of Phrygia, sir, to bring</div>
                              <div class="line">a Cressida to this Troilus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I understand you, sir; 'tis well begged.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">The matter, I hope, is not great, sir, begging but</div>
                              <div class="line">a beggar: Cressida was a beggar. My lady is</div>
                              <div class="line">within, sir. I will construe to them whence you</div>
                              <div class="line">come; who you are and what you would are out of my</div>
                              <div class="line">welkin, I might say 'element,' but the word is over-worn.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">This fellow is wise enough to play the fool;</div>
                              <div class="line">And to do that well craves a kind of wit:</div>
                              <div class="line">He must observe their mood on whom he jests,</div>
                              <div class="line">The quality of persons, and the time,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, like the haggard, cheque at every feather</div>
                              <div class="line">That comes before his eye. This is a practise</div>
                              <div class="line">As full of labour as a wise man's art</div>
                              <div class="line">For folly that he wisely shows is fit;</div>
                              <div class="line">But wise men, folly-fall'n, quite taint their wit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter SIR TOBY BELCH, and SIR ANDREW</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Save you, gentleman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">And you, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Dieu vous garde, monsieur.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Et vous aussi; votre serviteur.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope, sir, you are; and I am yours.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you encounter the house? my niece is desirous</div>
                              <div class="line">you should enter, if your trade be to her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am bound to your niece, sir; I mean, she is the</div>
                              <div class="line">list of my voyage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Taste your legs, sir; put them to motion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">My legs do better understand me, sir, than I</div>
                              <div class="line">understand what you mean by bidding me taste my legs.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">I mean, to go, sir, to enter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I will answer you with gait and entrance. But we</div>
                              <div class="line">are prevented.</div>
                              <p>Enter OLIVIA and MARIA</p>
                              <div class="line">Most excellent accomplished lady, the heavens rain</div>
                              <div class="line">odours on you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">That youth's a rare courtier: 'Rain odours;' well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">My matter hath no voice, to your own most pregnant</div>
                              <div class="line">and vouchsafed ear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">'Odours,' 'pregnant' and 'vouchsafed:' I'll get 'em</div>
                              <div class="line">all three all ready.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Let the garden door be shut, and leave me to my hearing.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt SIR TOBY BELCH, SIR ANDREW, and MARIA</p>
                              <div class="line">Give me your hand, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">My duty, madam, and most humble service.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">What is your name?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Cesario is your servant's name, fair princess.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">My servant, sir! 'Twas never merry world</div>
                              <div class="line">Since lowly feigning was call'd compliment:</div>
                              <div class="line">You're servant to the Count Orsino, youth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">And he is yours, and his must needs be yours:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your servant's servant is your servant, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">For him, I think not on him: for his thoughts,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would they were blanks, rather than fill'd with me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, I come to whet your gentle thoughts</div>
                              <div class="line">On his behalf.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, by your leave, I pray you,</div>
                              <div class="line">I bade you never speak again of him:</div>
                              <div class="line">But, would you undertake another suit,</div>
                              <div class="line">I had rather hear you to solicit that</div>
                              <div class="line">Than music from the spheres.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Dear lady,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me leave, beseech you. I did send,</div>
                              <div class="line">After the last enchantment you did here,</div>
                              <div class="line">A ring in chase of you: so did I abuse</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself, my servant and, I fear me, you:</div>
                              <div class="line">Under your hard construction must I sit,</div>
                              <div class="line">To force that on you, in a shameful cunning,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which you knew none of yours: what might you think?</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you not set mine honour at the stake</div>
                              <div class="line">And baited it with all the unmuzzled thoughts</div>
                              <div class="line">That tyrannous heart can think? To one of your receiving</div>
                              <div class="line">Enough is shown: a cypress, not a bosom,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hideth my heart. So, let me hear you speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I pity you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">That's a degree to love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, not a grize; for 'tis a vulgar proof,</div>
                              <div class="line">That very oft we pity enemies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, methinks 'tis time to smile again.</div>
                              <div class="line">O, world, how apt the poor are to be proud!</div>
                              <div class="line">If one should be a prey, how much the better</div>
                              <div class="line">To fall before the lion than the wolf!</div>
                              <p>Clock strikes</p>
                              <div class="line">The clock upbraids me with the waste of time.</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not afraid, good youth, I will not have you:</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet, when wit and youth is come to harvest,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your were is alike to reap a proper man:</div>
                              <div class="line">There lies your way, due west.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Then westward-ho! Grace and good disposition</div>
                              <div class="line">Attend your ladyship!</div>
                              <div class="line">You'll nothing, madam, to my lord by me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Stay:</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, tell me what thou thinkest of me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">That you do think you are not what you are.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">If I think so, I think the same of you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Then think you right: I am not what I am.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I would you were as I would have you be!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Would it be better, madam, than I am?</div>
                              <div class="line">I wish it might, for now I am your fool.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, what a deal of scorn looks beautiful</div>
                              <div class="line">In the contempt and anger of his lip!</div>
                              <div class="line">A murderous guilt shows not itself more soon</div>
                              <div class="line">Than love that would seem hid: love's night is noon.</div>
                              <div class="line">Cesario, by the roses of the spring,</div>
                              <div class="line">By maidhood, honour, truth and every thing,</div>
                              <div class="line">I love thee so, that, maugre all thy pride,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor wit nor reason can my passion hide.</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not extort thy reasons from this clause,</div>
                              <div class="line">For that I woo, thou therefore hast no cause,</div>
                              <div class="line">But rather reason thus with reason fetter,</div>
                              <div class="line">Love sought is good, but given unsought better.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VIOLA</div>
                              <div class="line">By innocence I swear, and by my youth</div>
                              <div class="line">I have one heart, one bosom and one truth,</div>
                              <div class="line">And that no woman has; nor never none</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall mistress be of it, save I alone.</div>
                              <div class="line">And so adieu, good madam: never more</div>
                              <div class="line">Will I my master's tears to you deplore.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet come again; for thou perhaps mayst move</div>
                              <div class="line">That heart, which now abhors, to like his love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  OLIVIA's house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter SIR TOBY BELCH, SIR ANDREW, and FABIAN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">No, faith, I'll not stay a jot longer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy reason, dear venom, give thy reason.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">You must needs yield your reason, Sir Andrew.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, I saw your niece do more favours to the</div>
                              <div class="line">count's serving-man than ever she bestowed upon me;</div>
                              <div class="line">I saw't i' the orchard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Did she see thee the while, old boy? tell me that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">As plain as I see you now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">This was a great argument of love in her toward you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">'Slight, will you make an ass o' me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I will prove it legitimate, sir, upon the oaths of</div>
                              <div class="line">judgment and reason.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">And they have been grand-jury-men since before Noah</div>
                              <div class="line">was a sailor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">She did show favour to the youth in your sight only</div>
                              <div class="line">to exasperate you, to awake your dormouse valour, to</div>
                              <div class="line">put fire in your heart and brimstone in your liver.</div>
                              <div class="line">You should then have accosted her; and with some</div>
                              <div class="line">excellent jests, fire-new from the mint, you should</div>
                              <div class="line">have banged the youth into dumbness. This was</div>
                              <div class="line">looked for at your hand, and this was balked: the</div>
                              <div class="line">double gilt of this opportunity you let time wash</div>
                              <div class="line">off, and you are now sailed into the north of my</div>
                              <div class="line">lady's opinion; where you will hang like an icicle</div>
                              <div class="line">on a Dutchman's beard, unless you do redeem it by</div>
                              <div class="line">some laudable attempt either of valour or policy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">An't be any way, it must be with valour; for policy</div>
                              <div class="line">I hate: I had as lief be a Brownist as a</div>
                              <div class="line">politician.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, build me thy fortunes upon the basis of</div>
                              <div class="line">valour. Challenge me the count's youth to fight</div>
                              <div class="line">with him; hurt him in eleven places: my niece shall</div>
                              <div class="line">take note of it; and assure thyself, there is no</div>
                              <div class="line">love-broker in the world can more prevail in man's</div>
                              <div class="line">commendation with woman than report of valour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">There is no way but this, Sir Andrew.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Will either of you bear me a challenge to him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, write it in a martial hand; be curst and brief;</div>
                              <div class="line">it is no matter how witty, so it be eloquent and fun</div>
                              <div class="line">of invention: taunt him with the licence of ink:</div>
                              <div class="line">if thou thou'st him some thrice, it shall not be</div>
                              <div class="line">amiss; and as many lies as will lie in thy sheet of</div>
                              <div class="line">paper, although the sheet were big enough for the</div>
                              <div class="line">bed of Ware in England, set 'em down: go, about it.</div>
                              <div class="line">Let there be gall enough in thy ink, though thou</div>
                              <div class="line">write with a goose-pen, no matter: about it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Where shall I find you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll call thee at the cubiculo: go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit SIR ANDREW</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">This is a dear manikin to you, Sir Toby.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">I have been dear to him, lad, some two thousand</div>
                              <div class="line">strong, or so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">We shall have a rare letter from him: but you'll</div>
                              <div class="line">not deliver't?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Never trust me, then; and by all means stir on the</div>
                              <div class="line">youth to an answer. I think oxen and wainropes</div>
                              <div class="line">cannot hale them together. For Andrew, if he were</div>
                              <div class="line">opened, and you find so much blood in his liver as</div>
                              <div class="line">will clog the foot of a flea, I'll eat the rest of</div>
                              <div class="line">the anatomy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">And his opposite, the youth, bears in his visage no</div>
                              <div class="line">great presage of cruelty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter MARIA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Look, where the youngest wren of nine comes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">If you desire the spleen, and will laugh yourself</div>
                              <div class="line">into stitches, follow me. Yond gull Malvolio is</div>
                              <div class="line">turned heathen, a very renegado; for there is no</div>
                              <div class="line">Christian, that means to be saved by believing</div>
                              <div class="line">rightly, can ever believe such impossible passages</div>
                              <div class="line">of grossness. He's in yellow stockings.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">And cross-gartered?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Most villanously; like a pedant that keeps a school</div>
                              <div class="line">i' the church. I have dogged him, like his</div>
                              <div class="line">murderer. He does obey every point of the letter</div>
                              <div class="line">that I dropped to betray him: he does smile his</div>
                              <div class="line">face into more lines than is in the new map with the</div>
                              <div class="line">augmentation of the Indies: you have not seen such</div>
                              <div class="line">a thing as 'tis. I can hardly forbear hurling things</div>
                              <div class="line">at him. I know my lady will strike him: if she do,</div>
                              <div class="line">he'll smile and take't for a great favour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, bring us, bring us where he is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter SEBASTIAN and ANTONIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I would not by my will have troubled you;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, since you make your pleasure of your pains,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will no further chide you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I could not stay behind you: my desire,</div>
                              <div class="line">More sharp than filed steel, did spur me forth;</div>
                              <div class="line">And not all love to see you, though so much</div>
                              <div class="line">As might have drawn one to a longer voyage,</div>
                              <div class="line">But jealousy what might befall your travel,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being skilless in these parts; which to a stranger,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unguided and unfriended, often prove</div>
                              <div class="line">Rough and unhospitable: my willing love,</div>
                              <div class="line">The rather by these arguments of fear,</div>
                              <div class="line">Set forth in your pursuit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">My kind Antonio,</div>
                              <div class="line">I can no other answer make but thanks,</div>
                              <div class="line">And thanks; and ever oft good turns</div>
                              <div class="line">Are shuffled off with such uncurrent pay:</div>
                              <div class="line">But, were my worth as is my conscience firm,</div>
                              <div class="line">You should find better dealing. What's to do?</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall we go see the reliques of this town?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">To-morrow, sir: best first go see your lodging.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not weary, and 'tis long to night:</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, let us satisfy our eyes</div>
                              <div class="line">With the memorials and the things of fame</div>
                              <div class="line">That do renown this city.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Would you'ld pardon me;</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not without danger walk these streets:</div>
                              <div class="line">Once, in a sea-fight, 'gainst the count his galleys</div>
                              <div class="line">I did some service; of such note indeed,</div>
                              <div class="line">That were I ta'en here it would scarce be answer'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Belike you slew great number of his people.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The offence is not of such a bloody nature;</div>
                              <div class="line">Albeit the quality of the time and quarrel</div>
                              <div class="line">Might well have given us bloody argument.</div>
                              <div class="line">It might have since been answer'd in repaying</div>
                              <div class="line">What we took from them; which, for traffic's sake,</div>
                              <div class="line">Most of our city did: only myself stood out;</div>
                              <div class="line">For which, if I be lapsed in this place,</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall pay dear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not then walk too open.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">It doth not fit me. Hold, sir, here's my purse.</div>
                              <div class="line">In the south suburbs, at the Elephant,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is best to lodge: I will bespeak our diet,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whiles you beguile the time and feed your knowledge</div>
                              <div class="line">With viewing of the town: there shall you have me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Why I your purse?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Haply your eye shall light upon some toy</div>
                              <div class="line">You have desire to purchase; and your store,</div>
                              <div class="line">I think, is not for idle markets, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll be your purse-bearer and leave you</div>
                              <div class="line">For an hour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">To the Elephant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I do remember.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  OLIVIA's garden.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter OLIVIA and MARIA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I have sent after him: he says he'll come;</div>
                              <div class="line">How shall I feast him? what bestow of him?</div>
                              <div class="line">For youth is bought more oft than begg'd or borrow'd.</div>
                              <div class="line">I speak too loud.</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is Malvolio? he is sad and civil,</div>
                              <div class="line">And suits well for a servant with my fortunes:</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is Malvolio?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">He's coming, madam; but in very strange manner. He</div>
                              <div class="line">is, sure, possessed, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what's the matter? does he rave?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">No. madam, he does nothing but smile: your</div>
                              <div class="line">ladyship were best to have some guard about you, if</div>
                              <div class="line">he come; for, sure, the man is tainted in's wits.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Go call him hither.</div>
                              <p>Exit MARIA</p>
                              <div class="line">I am as mad as he,</div>
                              <div class="line">If sad and merry madness equal be.</div>
                              <p>Re-enter MARIA, with MALVOLIO</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, Malvolio!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet lady, ho, ho.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Smilest thou?</div>
                              <div class="line">I sent for thee upon a sad occasion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sad, lady! I could be sad: this does make some</div>
                              <div class="line">obstruction in the blood, this cross-gartering; but</div>
                              <div class="line">what of that? if it please the eye of one, it is</div>
                              <div class="line">with me as the very true sonnet is, 'Please one, and</div>
                              <div class="line">please all.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how dost thou, man? what is the matter with thee?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not black in my mind, though yellow in my legs. It</div>
                              <div class="line">did come to his hands, and commands shall be</div>
                              <div class="line">executed: I think we do know the sweet Roman hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Wilt thou go to bed, Malvolio?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">To bed! ay, sweet-heart, and I'll come to thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">God comfort thee! Why dost thou smile so and kiss</div>
                              <div class="line">thy hand so oft?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">How do you, Malvolio?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">At your request! yes; nightingales answer daws.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why appear you with this ridiculous boldness before my lady?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Be not afraid of greatness:' 'twas well writ.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">What meanest thou by that, Malvolio?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Some are born great,'--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Some achieve greatness,'--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">What sayest thou?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'And some have greatness thrust upon them.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven restore thee!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Remember who commended thy yellow stockings,'--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy yellow stockings!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'And wished to see thee cross-gartered.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Cross-gartered!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Go to thou art made, if thou desirest to be so;'--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Am I made?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'If not, let me see thee a servant still.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, this is very midsummer madness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter Servant</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, the young gentleman of the Count Orsino's is</div>
                              <div class="line">returned: I could hardly entreat him back: he</div>
                              <div class="line">attends your ladyship's pleasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll come to him.</div>
                              <p>Exit Servant</p>
                              <div class="line">Good Maria, let this fellow be looked to. Where's</div>
                              <div class="line">my cousin Toby? Let some of my people have a special</div>
                              <div class="line">care of him: I would not have him miscarry for the</div>
                              <div class="line">half of my dowry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt OLIVIA and MARIA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, ho! do you come near me now? no worse man than</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir Toby to look to me! This concurs directly with</div>
                              <div class="line">the letter: she sends him on purpose, that I may</div>
                              <div class="line">appear stubborn to him; for she incites me to that</div>
                              <div class="line">in the letter. 'Cast thy humble slough,' says she;</div>
                              <div class="line">'be opposite with a kinsman, surly with servants;</div>
                              <div class="line">let thy tongue tang with arguments of state; put</div>
                              <div class="line">thyself into the trick of singularity;' and</div>
                              <div class="line">consequently sets down the manner how; as, a sad</div>
                              <div class="line">face, a reverend carriage, a slow tongue, in the</div>
                              <div class="line">habit of some sir of note, and so forth. I have</div>
                              <div class="line">limed her; but it is Jove's doing, and Jove make me</div>
                              <div class="line">thankful! And when she went away now, 'Let this</div>
                              <div class="line">fellow be looked to:' fellow! not Malvolio, nor</div>
                              <div class="line">after my degree, but fellow. Why, every thing</div>
                              <div class="line">adheres together, that no dram of a scruple, no</div>
                              <div class="line">scruple of a scruple, no obstacle, no incredulous</div>
                              <div class="line">or unsafe circumstance--What can be said? Nothing</div>
                              <div class="line">that can be can come between me and the full</div>
                              <div class="line">prospect of my hopes. Well, Jove, not I, is the</div>
                              <div class="line">doer of this, and he is to be thanked.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter MARIA, with SIR TOBY BELCH and FABIAN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Which way is he, in the name of sanctity? If all</div>
                              <div class="line">the devils of hell be drawn in little, and Legion</div>
                              <div class="line">himself possessed him, yet I'll speak to him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Here he is, here he is. How is't with you, sir?</div>
                              <div class="line">how is't with you, man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Go off; I discard you: let me enjoy my private: go</div>
                              <div class="line">off.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Lo, how hollow the fiend speaks within him! did not</div>
                              <div class="line">I tell you? Sir Toby, my lady prays you to have a</div>
                              <div class="line">care of him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, ha! does she so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to, go to; peace, peace; we must deal gently</div>
                              <div class="line">with him: let me alone. How do you, Malvolio? how</div>
                              <div class="line">is't with you? What, man! defy the devil:</div>
                              <div class="line">consider, he's an enemy to mankind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you know what you say?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">La you, an you speak ill of the devil, how he takes</div>
                              <div class="line">it at heart! Pray God, he be not bewitched!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Carry his water to the wise woman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, and it shall be done to-morrow morning, if I</div>
                              <div class="line">live. My lady would not lose him for more than I'll say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, mistress!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">O Lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, hold thy peace; this is not the way: do</div>
                              <div class="line">you not see you move him? let me alone with him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">No way but gentleness; gently, gently: the fiend is</div>
                              <div class="line">rough, and will not be roughly used.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how now, my bawcock! how dost thou, chuck?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, Biddy, come with me. What, man! 'tis not for</div>
                              <div class="line">gravity to play at cherry-pit with Satan: hang</div>
                              <div class="line">him, foul collier!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Get him to say his prayers, good Sir Toby, get him to pray.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My prayers, minx!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, I warrant you, he will not hear of godliness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, hang yourselves all! you are idle shallow</div>
                              <div class="line">things: I am not of your element: you shall know</div>
                              <div class="line">more hereafter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't possible?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">If this were played upon a stage now, I could</div>
                              <div class="line">condemn it as an improbable fiction.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">His very genius hath taken the infection of the device, man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, pursue him now, lest the device take air and taint.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, we shall make him mad indeed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">The house will be the quieter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, we'll have him in a dark room and bound. My</div>
                              <div class="line">niece is already in the belief that he's mad: we</div>
                              <div class="line">may carry it thus, for our pleasure and his penance,</div>
                              <div class="line">till our very pastime, tired out of breath, prompt</div>
                              <div class="line">us to have mercy on him: at which time we will</div>
                              <div class="line">bring the device to the bar and crown thee for a</div>
                              <div class="line">finder of madmen. But see, but see.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter SIR ANDREW</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">More matter for a May morning.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's the challenge, read it: warrant there's</div>
                              <div class="line">vinegar and pepper in't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't so saucy?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR ANDREW</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, is't, I warrant him: do but read.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me.</div>
                              <p>Reads</p>
                              <div class="line">'Youth, whatsoever thou art, thou art but a scurvy fellow.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Good, and valiant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'Wonder not, nor admire not in thy mind,</div>
                              <div class="line">why I do call thee so, for I will show thee no reason for't.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">A good note; that keeps you from the blow of the law.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'Thou comest to the lady Olivia, and in my</div>
                              <div class="line">sight she uses thee kindly: but thou liest in thy</div>
                              <div class="line">throat; that is not the matter I challenge thee for.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Very brief, and to exceeding good sense--less.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'I will waylay thee going home; where if it</div>
                              <div class="line">be thy chance to kill me,'--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Good.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'Thou killest me like a rogue and a villain.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FABIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Still you keep o' the windy side of the law: good.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'Fare thee well; and God have mercy upon</div>
                              <div class="line">one of our souls! He may have mercy upon mine; but</div>
                              <div class="line">my hope is better, and so look to thyself. Thy</div>
                              <div class="line">friend, as thou usest him, and thy sworn enemy,</div>
                              <div class="line">ANDREW AGUECHEEK.</div>
                              <div class="line">If this letter move him not, his legs cannot:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll give't him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">You may have very fit occasion for't: he is now in</div>
                              <div class="line">some commerce with my lady, and will by and by depart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR TOBY BELCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, Sir Andrew: scout me for him at the corner the</div>
                              <div class="line">orchard like a bum-baily: so soon as ever thou seest</div>
                              <div class="line">him, draw; and, as thou drawest swear horrible; for</div>
                              <div class="line">it comes to pass oft that a terrible oath, with a</div>
                              <div class="line">swaggering accent sharply twanged off, gives manhood</div>
                              <div class="line">more approbation than ever proof itself would have</div>
                              <div class="line">earned him. Away!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
